quotes.quote: To teach is to learn twice.
A teacher is one who helps others and influences lives forever.
I think the teaching profession contributes more to the future of our society than any other single profession.
Teaching is more than imparting knowledge, it is inspiring change. Learning is more than absorbing facts, it is acquiring understanding.
Anyone who does anything to help a child in his life is a hero to me.
A great teacher never strives to explain his vision. He simply invites you to stand beside him and see for yourself.
Teaching is the profession that teaches all of the other professions.
A good teacher must know the rules; a good pupil, the exceptions.
What is a teacher? I'll tell you: it isn't someone who teaches something, but someone who inspires the student to give of her best in order to discover what she already knows.
The average teacher explains complexity; the gifted teacher reveals simplicity.
All teachers teach history to those who will make history.
Students don't care how much you know until they know how much you care.
A good teacher is like a candle, it consumes itself to light the way for others.
Education is the key to success in life, and teachers make a lasting impact in the lives of their students.
A very wise old teacher once said: I consider a day's teaching wasted if we do not all have one hearty laugh.
What we want is to see the child in pursuit of knowledge, and not knowledge in pursuit of the child.
There is no recipe to be a great teacher, that's what is unique about them.
A good teacher, like a good entertainer first must hold his audience's attention, then he can teach his lesson.
Teaching is the greatest act of optimism.
One child, one teacher, one book, one pen can change the world.
Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character, caliber, and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher, that will be the biggest honour for me.
Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
The teacher is the one who gets the most out of the lessons, and the true teacher is the learner.
A teacher is a compass that activates the magnets of curiosity, knowledge, and wisdom in the pupils.
The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character, that is the goal of true education.
Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges.
If kids come to us from strong, healthy functioning families, it makes our job easier. If they do not come to us from strong, healthy, functioning families, it makes our job more important.
If you would thoroughly know anything, teach it to others.
A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
